original_title: One Direction: Clevver's Ultimate Fan Guide
overview: Jill Wilderman - Clevver explores the group's rise to fame as told by celebrities and fans who know them best. In their own quirky way, stars like Robert Pattinson, Miranda Cosgrove, and many more reveal their thoughts on the mega-famous group. -  Zach Sang
title: One Direction: Clevver's Ultimate Fan Guide
